sunflower.stage_names: sowing germination emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flag_leaf flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe end_crop

pesw_germ.description: plant extractable soil water in seedling layer inadequate for germination (mm/mm)

shoot_lag.description: time lag before linear coleoptile growth starts (deg days)

shoot_rate.description: growing deg day increase with depth for coleoptile (deg day/mm depth)

twilight.description: Twilight is defined as the interval between sunrise or sunset and the time when the true centre of the sun

leaf_no_seed.description: number of leaf primordia present in seed

leaf_no_at_emerg.description: (expanded) leaf number at emergence, cotyledons not counted

leaf_init_rate.description: From Scott's Gatton data - 8 experiments and 10 cultivars -

leaf_app_rate1.description: growing deg day required to develop the most leaf ligules. (deg day).

leaf_app_rate2.description: growing deg day required to develop last leaf ligules. (deg day).

leaf_no_rate_change.description: leaf no below flag above which leaf appearance rate changes from rate1 to rate2. !!!!RELATIVE to FLAG

rue.description: g bio/MJ SWSRadn radiation use efficiency

row_spacing_default.description: Default rowing spacing used to calculate k

x_temp_photo.description: for cool nights - not working yet

stem_trans_frac.description: fraction of anthesis stem wt available for translocation to grain

leaf_trans_frac.description: fraction of anthesis leaf wt available for translocation to grain

flower_trans_frac.description: fraction of anthesis flower wt available for translocation to grain

ratio_root_shoot.description: scc prob. can get some better idea of root/shoot ratios from UQ solution culture exps.

partition_rate_leaf.description: new rate was 0.0182 for maize rate coefficient of sigmoidal

frac_stem2flower.description: fraction of dm allocated to stem that goes to developing head

sla_min.description: 8000 ! minimum specific leaf area for new leaf area

x_sw_ratio.description: water availability for effects on root growth...

specific_root_length.description: specific length of roots - who knows?

eo_crop_factor_default.description: default crop factor for limiting soil

x_sw_demand_ratio.description: water availability This is the original value

x_sw_avail_ratio.description: water availability Needs to be sever to worry phen

N_fact_photo.description: multipler for N deficit effect on photosynthesis

N_fact_pheno.description: multipler for N deficit effect on

N_fact_expansion.description: multipler for N deficit effect on leaf expansion

N_fact_pheno_lb.description: Not working at present, but is set to 0.5 in code (i.e. n_fact_pheno cannot go lower than 0.5)

dm_root_sen_frac.description: fraction of root dry matter senesced each day

dm_leaf_sen_frac.description: fraction of senescing leaf dry matter

dm_leaf_detach_frac.description: fraction of senesced leaf detached each day from live plants

leaf_no_crit.description: critical number of leaves, below which portion of the crop may die due to water stress

tt_emerg_limit.description: maximum degree days allowed for emergence to take place

days_germ_limit.description: maximum days allowed after dry sowing for germination to take place

swdf_pheno_limit.description: critical cumulative phenology water stress, above which the crop completely fails

swdf_photo_limit.description: critical cumulative photosynthesis water stress, above which the crop partly fails (unitless)

tpla_inflection_ratio.description: scc introduced by SCC as a replacement for p_tpla_inflection

head_grain_no_crit.description: 110 for maize ! grains per head minimum, below

barren_crit.description: 0.5 for maize ! fraction of maximum grains per plant

grain_n_conc_min.description: Bange exp 2 ! minimum nitrogen concentration of grain

seed_wt_min.description: Bange exp 1, sow 2 ! minimum grain weight (g/seed)

kl_ub.description: upper limit of water uptake factor

hi_min.units: g dm grain/g dm plant top

htstress_coeff.description: 0.019 ! coeff for conversion of heat stress

sen_light_slope.description: sensitivity of leaf area senescence to

sen_radn_crit.description: radiation level for onset of light

temp_grain_crit_stress.description: 38 ! Tmax above which grain no. is reduced

x_node_num_lar.description: Node number determining leaf appearance rate

y_node_lar.description: Leaf appearance rate determined by node number (Phyllochron dd)

determinate_crop.description: Indicate the crop being determinate (1) or indeterminate (0)

tt_flag_to_flower.description: !In sunflower, delay between 'flag' and flowering should be v. small.

tpla_prod_coef.description: parameter a in QSUN (fig. 4) curvature coefficient for leaf area

rel_leaf_init_rate.description: 0.66 !This is the multiplier for leaf_init_rate. Expressed relative to Sunfola 68-2 which has
